text: Barreiro is a city and a municipality in the District of Setúbal in Portugal. It officially became a city in 1984. ==Sports== F.C. Barreirense is the largest team in Barreiro. Portuguese international footballers like José Augusto, Fernando Chalana, and João Cancelo were born in Barreiro, as well as Dutch international Bruno Martins Indi. ==Other websites== *Town Hall official website *Facebook Page * Android App : VisitBarreiro Category:Cities in Portugal Category:Municipalities of Portugal Category:Setúbal District
title: Barreiro, Portugal
